page.title: 09Castle Douglas High School 2
page.content: Pupils attend school 5 days a week for 40 weeks of the year. The school day starts at 9.00 am and ends at 3.45 pm. Pupils transfer from Castle Douglas, Springholm, Gelston, Crossmichael, Laurieston and Hardgate primaries at 11 years of age. The school has been modernised with the installation of computers, television and video recorders. The school has a library with a wide selection of books. For sports purposes pupils and teachers are allocated to 4 Houses: Kelton,Merrick, Solway and Threave. The school meals are very good and a wide choice is available at fair prices. There is also a tuck shop which is open during the morning interval. The school has an annual Sports Day in June.
